sen.j: さいかち浜水泳場（さいかちはますいえいじょう）とは、滋賀県長浜市高橋町および、田村町にある琵琶湖に面する長浜市営の水泳場である。
sen.e: Saikachihama Swimming Area is a swimming area operated by Nagahama City which is located in Takahashi-cho and Tamura-cho in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture facing Lake Biwa.
Saikachihama Swimming Area is a swimming area operated by Nagahama City which is located in Takahashi-cho and Tamura-cho in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture facing Lake Biwa.
Saikachihama Swimming Area is a swimming area operated by Nagahama City which is located in Takahashi-cho and Tamura-cho in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture facing Lake Biwa.

sen.j: 椅子が用意され、簡単な飲食等が出来る屋根つきの建物が設置されている。
sen.e: Chairs are provided and a roofed building in which quick meal and drink can be taken is provided.
Chairs are provided and a roofed building in which quick meal and drink can be taken is provided.
Chairs are provided and a roofed building in which quick meal and drink can be taken is provided.

sen.j: 夏には、市民が少人数でバーベキューや花火をすることがある。
sen.e: In the summertime, citizens in small group sometimes enjoy barbecue or firework.
In the summertime, citizens in small groups sometimes come to enjoy barbecues or fireworks.
In the summertime, citizens in small groups sometimes come to enjoy barbecues or fireworks.

sen.j: その昔、琵琶湖の湖岸沿いにサイカチが植林されていたことに由来するとされている。
sen.e: It is said that the origin of the name is that saikachi (Japanese honey locust) had been planted along lakeside of Lake Biwa.
It is said that the origin of the name is that saikachi (Japanese honey locust) had been planted along lakeside of Lake Biwa.
It is said that the origin of the name is that saikachi (Japanese honey locust) had been planted along lakeside of Lake Biwa.
